data.message: I'ma keep it real, all of you know this song is shit compared to old eminem's song, Is like if he has lost his inspiration, the only thing i keep liking from this song is the lyrics, like always his songs are meaningful, but he has lost the rythim from old marshall bruce mathers :/ I miss the old Eminem. But He's my idol and i gotta support him.

replies.message: Sad you call yourself an em fan, listen to the god damn lyrics of the song as it goes he can't keep rapping about same shit y you think he's different now and as he is changing he's still on top of charts the song is lyrically smart you haven't listen ed to it yet

That's what i said "the only thing i keep liking from this song is the lyrics" what i'm trying to say is that he doesn't put that HEART&SOUL into his music like he used to like in the album "Slim Shady LP1" He is now like singing songs just for continuing to be heard. But it isn't even 10% of what his musics used to be. If you don't realize that compare this music with "Beautiful" or "Stan" and look at the difference.

I don't think beautiful maybe wasn't really about Detroit but seems like that video coinsided with Detroit being debated politically at the time,it was really emotional for people who are,used to be,have family there or are connected to Detroit,like I haven't lived there since I was ten but still have family there,then here,toledo was depending on the auto industry bail out too,peoples jobs were on the line,hit home for us too so maybe he had a little more fuel or something with that album since he decided to throw the Detroit-auto industry info into the video,who knows

Is no one ever allowed to grow up or mature as a musician. I'm a fan since day one. Everyone feelings change. Nothing ever stays the same. He can't feel the same way he did back in 1998 and 1999. It's not right to have that.Mentality. If you were famous don't think things for you will change?us fans have too realize that writing music and beats is extremly difficult. He came back for him and for us fans. To tell you the truth once he really retires it will be extremly difficult to purchase a new rap cd. I love old school rap. Ice cube. 50. Dr.dre. Then eminem. I don't feel the love that comes from anyone else's music. And for me that's real
